name: ShotKill
description:
- ShotKill - Fight, impose your fps skill on different map, With 4 different Soldier classes -

- Team Death Match,
- Free For All
- Capture of Flag.
- Private and Public match
- Four Class Elite
- Class customization
- Bots Enemy
- System for Build
- Level Player
- Level Weapons
- Friend List
- Lobby chat
- Game chat
- Score board
- Kick Votation System
- Team selection and Auto-Team selection
- User login of a score, kills, playtime
- User problem and cheater reporting tool

The game will constantly evolve with updates
